headline: Education:
texts: I graduated from Budapest University of Technology and Economics.
I studied Computer Engineering as my major, with a specialization in Data Science. I have expertise in both fields.

headline: Experience:
texts: [2022.feb - still working][BME-AUT Industry 4.0 Technology Centre] Computer Vision Engineer, Full Stack Developer - Junior
[2022.feb - 2023.feb][Freelance, marminalunk.com & some smaller projects] - Backend Developer

headline: Hobbies:
texts: In my free time, I enjoy learning new skills such as image processing, database management, and system design.
I played basketball for 13 years when I was young. I still have a strong passion for the game, and enjoy analyzing NBA games and player statistics.
I enjoy spending time with friends, playing board games, camping, and attending meetups.
